name: VAX DarkWorld Demo
description:
Welcome to VAX DarkWorld! You play as a white blood cell fighting to defeat the evil virus KEVIS-21 Zulu! using your arsenal of VAX weapons, fight inside the human body as you meet different types of npc cells and take on strange and mysterious enemies!

This is a demo/prototype some things in the game are temporary.

Once you finish the demo, there is a short survey I would like you to complete to determine the future of this project. Thank you! Link to survey - https://forms.gle/oRiHZeKR44x7DsxV6
